content.rendered:
The University of La Verne Office of Information Technology offers a range of IT training to meet the needs of faculty, staff and students.

Training Opportunities

  • Information Security Awareness Training (for Faculty and Staff)
    • OIT has partnered with Human Resources and their Everfi system for a continually updated information security training. Please contact Human Resources to request the training, which is required annually, at lavernehr@laverne.edu.
  • Office 365 Training
    • Eventbrite:  https://www.eventbrite.com/e/office-365-training-tickets-36611205100
  • WebEx Training
    • Eventbrite: tbd

Resource Guides

Cisco

  • Cisco WebEx Meeting Center Video Conferencing Quick Reference Guide (pdf)
  • How Do I Cisco Phone 7965 (pdf)
  • How Do I Cisco Phone 8945 (pdf)

Excel

  • Excel 2016 For Mac Quick Start Guide (pdf)
  • Excel 2016 Quick Start Guide (pdf)
  • Excel Mobile Quick Start Guide (pdf)

Personal Conference

  • How To Schedule a Personal Conference (pdf)

Outlook Calendar

  • MS Cheat sheet Outlook Calendar for Mac (pdf)
  • MS Cheat Sheet Outlook Calendar for Windows (pdf)

Outlook Mail

  • MS Cheat sheet Outlook Mail for Mac (pdf)
  • MS Cheat sheet Outlook Mail for Windows (pdf)
  • MS Cheatsheet Outlook Mail Online
  • MS Cheat sheet Outlook Mobile Android (pdf)
  • MS Cheat sheet Outlook Mobile iOS (pdf)

Office 365

  • How Do I Authenticate Office 365 (pdf)
  • Office 365 (pdf)

OneNote

  • OneNote 2016 for Mac Quick Start Guide (pdf)
  • OneNote 2016 Tips Tricks
  • OneNote Mobile Quick Start Guide (pdf)
  • OneNote 2016 Quick Start Guide (pdf)

Outlook

  • Outlook 2016 Quick Start Guide (pdf)
  • Outlook 2016 Tips Tricks
  • Outlook 2016 Quick Start Guide for Mac (pdf)

PowerPoint

  • Power 2016 for Mac Quick Start Guide (pdf)
  • PowerPoint Mobile Quick Start Guide (pdf)

Telepresence

  • Telepresence How Do I Quick Sheets (pdf)
  • Telepresence Locations (pdf)
  • Telepresence Instructions (pdf)
  • Telepresence and WebEx White Paper (pdf)
  • Telepresence User White Sheet (pdf)

WebEx

  • Definitions for WebEx and Telepresence (pdf)
  • Meeting types (pdf)
  • Operating a Telepresence Unit (pdf)
  • Special Event Tips for WebEx and Telepresence (pdf)
  • Telepresence Locations (png)
  • WebEx Event Check List (pdf)
  • WebEx Meeting Options (pdf)
  • WebEx Recording Space (pdf)
  • WebEx roles (png)

Word

  • Word 2016 for Mac (pdf)
  • Word Mobile Quick Start Guide (pdf)

Training Videos

Classroom Technology

  • Apple TV
  • HDMI Connection
  • Playing a DVD
  • Power Down
  • Power On
  • Projector Functions
  • Using the Podium PC
  • VGA Connection
  • Volume Functions
  • Wireless Microphone

Microsoft Videos

  • Access Video Training
  • Microsoft Teams Video Training
  • OneDrive Video Training
  • SharePoint Video Training
